Instruction: In a large pot over medium-high heat, brown the ground beef for 5 to 10 minutes. Drain the fat, then stir in the taco seasoning, tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, corn, and kidney beans. Combine well, lower the heat to low, and let it simmer for 1 to 2 hours to let the flavors blend.
The taco seasoning mix has been included in response to review feedback. The initial recipe used onion soup mix instead.
